content: 1 ssk psso do not turn the rem st will count as triangle or square turn first st picked up for next triangles row 2 and all rs row knit to end of sts in this section work two more triangles this way when all triangles have turn been worked fasten_off last st row 3 sl 1 p5 k2tog turn row 5 sl 1 p4 k2tog turn block if desired www frecklesandpurls com 2 ©2006 2011 allison locicero this material may not be reprinted or used for commercial purposes
